attributes.action: Every school should have a programme in place to teach children about sexual abuse
attributes.additional_details:
There should be some kind of programme in schools that teach children first of all what sexual abuse actualy is, the rights and wrongs of it and then have something in place so if a child wants to talk about anything, they can discuss it in a controlled and confidential atmosphere.
We see so many reports of sexual abuse in the news etc. Wouldnt it be great if we could stop half of those cases happening!! Many children dont know what is happening to them is wrong so this would be ideal!
Please help to make a change to this horrific topic. Thankyou
